content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how a homeowner using an off-the-grid PV solar system, in the same country as seen in the graph above, can power a home between 9:00 PM and 6:00 AM?

choices.label: Switching to the electrical grid to obtain power
Relying on sources like wind or hydroelectricity in times of darkness
Using excess energy from a sunny day stored in batteries for power
Burning wood to create heat and light for the home.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
